Html: Rawr v2.1.3 just does not open i double click and it says in a error window  The App failed to initialize properly. If anyone could give me a hand it is very much welcomed.

There are a couple possibilities.

A) You need to install the latest .NET Framework.
B) You need to uninstall whatever version of the .NET Framework you have and reinstall the latest version.
C) You need to fully unzip the whole Rawr v2.1.3 folder before opening it.

If none of those solve your issue, let me know.
Thanks i got it going now :)
